episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch02: Hey heyyy, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You ever consider becoming a streamer?

I thought you might wanna give it a try, so I’m
gonna be your producer and help you make your
streaming debut!

Here’s my pitch—I’m gonna mold you into THE
influencer rep of Pasio!

I mean, you’re pretty famous on Pasio already,
right?

I figure there’s gotta be a way to get the most
outta that fame of yours!

And if I capitalize on your popularity, my
subscriber numbers’ll rise like a super-fast
Eelektross—
Err, I mean I’m sure this’ll be lotsa fun!

Streaming videos yourself is actually more fun than
watching ’em—didja know that?

And you’ll get supportive comments from viewers
all over the world!

Your newfound fame’s gonna skyrocket you into
Pasio stardom!

And as your producer, my popularity will
skyrocket too!
TOTALLY a win-win, don’tcha think?

(Say it sounds fun and
you’re interested)
Nyahaha! That’s what I wanted to hear!

(Nervously ask if you could
really be a star.)
You’ll be fine! Just lemme handle everything!

Nyahaha! Don’t worry—this is gonna be awesome
for you!
Well, that settles it! Signed, sealed, committed!

Now let’s come up with some content and
start filming!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] finished recording
several videos of Iono-produced content...

So, how’d you like doing all those physical
challenges I cooked up for you?!

The “Super-Spicy Sandwich Challenge” and the
“Human Tries to Use Waterfall Challenge” were
pretty fantabulous, don’tcha think?

(Complain feebly that they were
really difficult.)
Well, yeah! Of course they weren’t easy!
But that hard work is what makes great videos!

(Ask her to come up with something
easier next time.)
NEVAR! Easy mode is for chumps!

You’ll never keep your viewers’ eyes glued to you
with halfhearted efforts!

Ze road to stardom is a perilous one! Which is why
it’s reeeaaally important to grab as much attention
as you can when you’re starting out!

Even I did a bunch of tough physical challenges
when I was a wee baby streamer!

I was still figurin’ out what it took to go viral.
Lemme tell ya, it wasn’t easy! Nyohoho!

I know it’s hard, but you gotta hit the ground
running and take big, wild swings to bring in
those sweet, sweet viewer numbers!

But! When it comes to making video content, there
are no guarantees!

If these videos don’t take off the way we hoped,
then we just gotta mix things up a bit!

Have no fear, Iono’s here! And she’s gonna lead
you straight to success!

Oh, but when you DO go viral and get all
popular, don’t go collabin’ with any other
channels, got it?

You’ll be a star, but I’ll still be the one who
discovered you.
And I wanna keep you all to myself!

You’ll always be an Iono exclusive,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
